statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_id > 50 AND customer_id != 100;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, timestamp FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT issue_name FROM common_issues WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND customer_id = 5;
SELECT issue_name, resolved FROM common_issues WHERE resolved = false ORDER BY issue_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data JOIN common_issues ON feedback_data.rating = common_issues.issue_id WHERE feedback_data.rating > 2 AND common_issues.resolved = true;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT issue_description FROM issues WHERE issue_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, service_rating FROM customer_service WHERE service_rating >= 3 ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id > 50 AND feedback_id < 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 200 AND feedback_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_service WHERE service_rating >= 4 ORDER BY service_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, feedback FROM customers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT name, feedback FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, feedback_id, rating FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT c.name, fc.category_name FROM customers c JOIN feedback_categories fc ON c.id = fc.id;
SELECT c.name, fc.category_name FROM customers c LEFT JOIN feedback_categories fc ON c.id = fc.id ORDER BY c.name DESC, fc.category_name ASC;
SELECT c.name, fr.rating FROM customers c JOIN feedback_ratings fr ON c.id = fr.feedback_id WHERE fr.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, tag_name FROM feedback_categories JOIN feedback_tags ON feedback_categories.category_id = feedback_tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT fc.category_name, ft.tag_name FROM feedback_categories fc JOIN feedback_tags ft ON fc.category_id = ft.tag_id;
SELECT ci.issue_description, cm.feedback_text FROM common_issues ci JOIN feedback_mapping fm ON ci.issue_id = fm.issue_id JOIN customer_feedback cm ON fm.feedback_id = cm.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_mapping ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
